descriptionHtml:
Modified the Nord Hero Bow and arrows, and also the spell "Flames". 
The bow has been modded so that when it shoots the [b][u]Nord Hero Arrows[/u][/b] that it literally shoots the shout fire balls of death.. Unrelenting force has also been modified that it is so powerful I can't even measure it.
The dragonscale armor has also been modded, so if you don't have dawnguard then they won't appear.
If you start a new game DON'T pick "The True Dragonborn" race because it is still in development. I mean you can... but you'll be a floating head.
Please be fair and rate/comment fairly this IS my first mod.
Should be updating soon.

/IMPORTANT - YOU NOW HAVE TO HAVE DAWNGUARD TO USE HAVE FUN!

Complete. You will find the Nord Hero "Crossbow, and "Bolt"" in a barrel in Jorrvaskr Basement! YAY... a scavenger hunt! They are actually a bow and arrow but the animations were changed. This is now also for special edition.
author: BroDog77
